def assign_mice_to_holes(N, M, H):
    M.sort()
    H.sort()
    max_time = 1
    for i in range(N):
        max_time = max(max_time, abs(H[i] - M[i]))
    return max_time

def assign_mice_to_holes(N, M, H):
    M.sort()
    H.sort()
    max_time = -1
    for i in range(N):
        max_time = max(max_time, abs(H[i] - M[i]))
    return max_time

def assign_mice_to_holes(N, M, H):
    M.sort()
    H.sort()
    max_time = 1
    for i in range(N):
        max_time = max(max_time, abs(H[i] - M[i]))
    return max_time

def assign_mice_to_holes(N, M, H):
    M.sort()
    H.sort()
    max_time = 0
    for i in range(N):
        max_time = max(max_time, abs(H[i] + M[i]))
    return max_time

def assign_mice_to_holes(N, M, H):
    M.sort()
    H.sort()
    max_time = 0
    for i in range(N):
        max_time = max(max_time, abs(H[i] * M[i]))
    return max_time
